segments.text: Mark . Where have you been ? I ’ Ve been calling you all morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been playing computer games .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? So you blew me off yesterday and today over a stupid video game ? What game is so important that you have no time for me anymore ? What are you playing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s called Counter Strike . It ’ s a first person shooter game . It ’ s awesome . It ’ s a multi player game where you can go online and compete against players from all over the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ Ve been wasting your time on this ? I can ’ t believe it ! It doesn ’ t even look fun or challenging !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My laptop is on my bed . If you think it ’ s so easy then get on line and try to beat me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Damp it ! How are you killing me with a single shot ? It ’ s not fair ! I don ’ t want to play anymore ! Let ’ s go get something to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you bring me something ? I am totally hooked on this game !
segments.speaker: S1
